com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.followers

Class GVFFollower

  • PathFollower
    • com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.followers.GVFFollower

  • public class GVFFollower
extends PathFollower

    State-of-the-art path follower based on the class GuidingVectorField.

    See Also:
    class GuidingVectorField

    • Constructor Detail

      • GVFFollower

        @JvmOverloads
public GVFFollower(@NotNull
                                 SimpleMotionConstraints constraints,
                                 @NotNull
                                 Pose2d admissibleError,
                                 double kN,
                                 double kOmega,
                                 @NotNull
                                 kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double> errorMapFunc,
                                 @NotNull
                                 NanoClock clock)

        State-of-the-art path follower based on the class GuidingVectorField.

        Parameters:
        constraints - robot motion constraints
        admissibleError - admissible/satisfactory pose error at the end of each move
        kN - normal vector weight (see class GuidingVectorField)
        kOmega - proportional heading gain
        errorMapFunc - error map function (see class GuidingVectorField)
        clock - clock
        See Also:
        class GuidingVectorField
